mapper.select: SELECT SEACH_SEQ, TYPE, AREAA, AREAB, AREAC, SILVERNAME, SERVICE, GRADE, LAUITUDE, LONGITUDE FROM SILVERSEARCH WHERE TYPE=#{type} ORDER BY GRADE
SELECT COUNT(SEACH_SEQ) FROM SILVERSEARCH WHERE TYPE=#{type}

SELECT A.SEACH_SEQ ,A.TYPE ,A.AREAA ,A.AREAB ,A.AREAC ,A.SILVERNAME ,A.SERVICE ,A.GRADE ,A.LAUITUDE ,A.LONGITUDE ,B.DETAIL_NUMBER ,B.ESTABLISHMENT ,B.APPROVAL ,B.ADDRESS ,B.TEL ,B.PARKINGLOT from SILVERSEARCH A ,DETAILS B where A.SEACH_SEQ = B.SEACH_SEQ ORDER BY GRADE

select A.SEACH_SEQ ,A.TYPE ,A.AREAA ,A.AREAB ,A.AREAC ,A.SILVERNAME ,A.SERVICE ,A.GRADE ,A.LAUITUDE ,A.LONGITUDE ,C.Establishment ,C.HP_service ,C.Protection ,C.Location ,C.Religion ,C.Hospital_tel ,C.hp_address ,C.holiday ,C.lunchTime ,C.ReceiptTime ,C.Facilityinformation from SILVERSEARCH A ,Hospital_details C where A.SEACH_SEQ = C.SEACH_SEQ and A.seach_seq = #{type} order by seach_seq;
